input: Batch request to obtain mandates signed in 2021 with 'Locked' status and creditor ID starting with 'DE56'.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /DirectDebitMandates?$filter=year(SignatureDate) eq 2021 and UserStatusCode eq '4' and startswith(CreditorPartyID, 'DE56') HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
